section.p: The gem in the snake’s head flares briefly, dazzling you. As your vision clears you see six wooden doorways set into the bank of earth beside you. Somehow you failed to notice them before.
One of these doors leads to vast treasure, the snake’s telepathic voice informs you. The others all conceal a ghastly doom. Choose one...

The doors look the same. There is nothing to say which has the treasure behind it.
Make a MAGIC roll at a Difficulty of 14 .
